options.menu.export.PDF.comment: Export whole KPI dashboard to PDF

options.menu.export.PDF.error.value: Export to PDF failed. Please try again.
options.menu.export.PDF.error.comment: Export whole KPI dashboard to PDF failed

options.menu.schedule.email.comment: Translate as imperative. Schedule emailing whole KPI dashboard

dialogs.schedule.email.submit.success.value: Success! Your dashboard is scheduled for emailing.

dialogs.schedule.email.submit.error.value: Failed to schedule the dashboard. Try again later.

filters.day.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {DAY} other {#D}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#d}', wrong '{#d.}').

filters.week.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {WEEK} other {#W}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#w}', wrong '{#w.}').

filters.month.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {MONTH} other {#M}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#m}', wrong '{#m.}').

filters.quarter.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {QUARTER} other {#Q}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#q}', wrong '{#q.}').

filters.year.previousPeriod.comment: In '{n, plural, one {YEAR} other {#Y}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is. Do not put dot character after period abbreviation (correct '{#y}', wrong '{#y.}').

filters.alertMessage.relativePreset.inPe.comment: Don't translate placeholders '{calendarIcon}', '{range}'. Example text: 'in period (calendar) from 2 months ago to 2 months ahead'

filters.alertMessage.relativePreset.rang.comment: In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS DAY} =1 {LAST DAY} other {LAST # DAYS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS WEEK} =1 {LAST WEEK} other {LAST # WEEKS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS MONTH} =1 {LAST MONTH} other {LAST # MONTHS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS QUARTER} =1 {LAST QUARTER} other {LAST # QUARTERS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.
In '{n, plural, =0 {THIS YEAR} =1 {LAST YEAR} other {LAST # YEARS}}' translate only uppercase words. Keep number placeholder '#' as is.

kpi.noData.value: No data for current filter settings. Try changing the filters.

dialogs.schedule.email.attachment.filter.comment: Keep the parentheses. Attachment with filters included.

dialogs.schedule.email.headline.comment: Translate as imperative. Schedule emailing whole KPI dashboard.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.label.comment: Count of repeats of the scheduled email.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.execute.o.comment: Example 'on day 2 of January'. Placeholder '{date}' refers to ordinal number of day of the month. Don't translate placeholder '{date}'.
Example: 'on the first Friday'. Translate only uppercase in 'ON THE {week, select, 1 {FIRST} 2 {SECOND} 3 {THIRD} 4 {FOURTH} other {LAST}} {day}'

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.every.comment: Example 'every 1 month'. FIXME: This needs to be split into variants 'every day', 'every week', ... since some languages uses different gramatical gender for the 'every' based on the subject.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.frequenci.comment: Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {DAY} other {DAYS}}'.
Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {MONTH} other {MONTHS}}'.
Translate only uppercase in '{n, plural, one {WEEK} other {WEEKS}}'.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.cus.comment: Repeats the schedule email using custom rules defined by the user.

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.mon.comment: Example: 'Monthly on the first Friday'. Translate only uppercase in 'MONTHLY ON THE {week, select, 1 {FIRST} 2 {SECOND} 3 {THIRD} 4 {FOURTH} other {LAST}} {day}'

dialogs.schedule.email.repeats.types.wee.comment: Example: 'Weekly on Friday'. Placeholder '{day}' refers to a day of a week. Don't translate placeholder '{day}'.

dialogs.schedule.email.time.label.comment: Translate as imperative. Date time of the schedule email.

dialogs.schedule.email.message.placehold.value:
Hello,

Your scheduled email is ready. You can download the dashboard in attachments.
dialogs.schedule.email.message.placehold.comment:
Don't translate '

' which adds 2 new lines to the text.

dialogs.schedule.email.submit.comment: Translate as imperative. Submit the schedule config form.

options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.in.value: This is not a valid email address.
options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.in.comment: Translate as imperative. Error message for recipient email address

options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.wa.value: You have already added this recipient.
options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.wa.comment: Translate as imperative. Warning email has been existed on recipient field in schedule email dialog

options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.wa.value: This email address does not belong to the workspace. Recipient may receive sensitive data.
options.menu.schedule.email.recipient.wa.comment: Translate as imperative. Warning email on recipient field in schedule email dialog

kpi.alertBox.title.value: Set an alert on KPI change

kpi.alertBox.unverifiedEmail.value: Sorry, you can't set an alert. Make sure your email is verified. If that doesn't help, ask your administrator to update your permissions.

kpi.alertBox.disabledInReadOnly.value: Alerting is disabled in the read-only mode

kpiAlertDialog.deleting.comment: Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

kpiAlertDialog.invalidNumber.value:
This number is not valid.
Double-check it and try again.
kpiAlertDialog.invalidNumber.comment: Do not translate HTML markup enclosed in <>.

kpiAlertDialog.filtersDiffer.value: KPI is now filtered differently than when the alert was set up.

kpiAlertDialog.savingFailed.value: Saving alert failed. Please try again.

kpiAlertDialog.deleteingFailed.value: Deleting alert failed. Please try again.

kpiAlertDialog.brokenAlertAppeal.value: To see correct KPI value, update the filters in this alert. You can also remove the alert.

kpiAlertDialog.brokenAlertDefaultDateLab.comment: Label used in broken alert dialog in case no other date label is found.

kpiAlertDialog.updatingTitle.comment: Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

kpiAlertDialog.updateBrokenFailed.value: Updating filters failed. Please try again.

kpiAlertDialog.settingTitle.comment: Use '…' as one character, not 3 dots ('...').

kpiAlertDialog.withAttributeFilters.comment: Don't translate placeholder '{numFilters}'. In '{numFilters, select, 1 {FILTER} other {FILTERS}}' translate only uppercase words.

kpiAlertDialog.unsaved.changes.message.value: There are unpublished changes that will be lost.
